article_title: Government Contracts Group Of The Year: Wiley Rein
article_text:
Government Contracts Group Of The Year: Wiley Rein

Law360, New York (January 15, 2015, 2:32 PM ET) -- The bench of government contracts attorneys at Wiley Rein LLP proved to be an invaluable asset to the firm's clients last year, supplying a bevy of high-profile bid protest wins and essential advisory services surrounding the Affordable Care Act rollout that vaulted the firm into Law360's Government Contracts Groups of the Year.



Standing out in a fiercely competitive legal field is no easy task for any government contracts team, but Wiley Rein practice group chair Rand Allen told Law360 that what sets his 42-attorney shop apart from...

To view the full article, register now.
